actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Motion to Table Made in House.
Motion to Table Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 251 - 158 (Record Vote No: 444).

official_title: A resolution to require that subcommittees of committees of the House have membership ratios in proportion to the membership of the two political parties in the House.

summary.text: Requires each subcommittee of the House of Representatives to have membership ratios proportionate to membership of the two political parties in each House Committee.

titles.title: A resolution to require that subcommittees of committees of the House have membership ratios in proportion to the membership of the two political parties in the House.
